overview:
Pam Patterson has over twenty years IT experience, progressing from database programming through systems administration to information security. The breadth of her network and server experience makes her a natural for an environment such as Bastionhost, where platform neutrality is critical. She has experience in government, military, industry and academic environments. Her Mechanical Engineering degree, CISSP credentials and ISO 9000 experience make her able to contribute to any project.

She brings strong Information Security skills to her Bastionhost role of Chief Security Officer, where she is dedicated to managing and protecting Bastionhost and client assets.
